root.description: Export the input image in a KMZ product.

parameter.name: Tile Size
parameter.description: Size of the tiles in the kmz product, in number of pixels (default = 512).

parameter.name: Image logo
parameter.description: Path to the image logo to add to the KMZ product.

parameter.name: Image legend
parameter.description: Path to the image legend to add to the KMZ product.

parameter.name: Default elevation
parameter.description: This parameter allows setting the default height above ellipsoid when there is no DEM available, no coverage for some points or pixels with no_data in the DEM tiles, and no geoid file has been set. This is also used by some application as an average elevation value.
